text: Lualaba is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Kolwezi. In 2015 the province was made from parts of the former Katanga Province. It has the territories of: * Dilolo * Kapanga * Sandoa * Lubudi * Mutshatsa ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Lualaba Province
